name: Vanishu2122 Airbrush Concealer
about: What it is:u00a0A full-coverage, weightless, and waterproof concealer with microspherical powders that blurs and brightens for up to 16 hours of skin perfection...Coverage: Full..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This crease-resistant, light-reflecting liquid concealer blends seamlessly into skin and diffuses the look of pores and fine lines. The highly pigmented formula evens skin tone to conceal the appearance of dark circles, blemishes, and other imperfections for a smooth, natural, and airbrushed finish...Clinical Results:Based on a US consumer study of 32 women:.- 97% found the formula lightweight on the skin.- 94% said the under-eye area looked brighter.- 94% reported a blurring or smoothing effect under the eyes
ingredients: Water/Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Mica, Butylene Glycol, CetylPeg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Pvp, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Barium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, VinylDimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Methicone, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Polysilicone-11, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Squalane, Stearic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use applicator to apply directly onto skin..-Blend with Vanishu2122 Seamless Finish Concealer Brush (sold separately), finger, or beauty sponge..-Concentrated formula requires just one to three dots under each eye..-To conceal, select a shade that matches the natural skin tone..-To highlight, select two shades lighter than the natural skin tone and apply to the high points of the face..-Pro Tip: this concealer range includes shades that can be used for color correcting.

reviews.review_title: Covers acne like no other concealer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone, combination, sensitive, hormonal skin. Been BATTLING acne like nobody's business. I've used the holy grail Nars pot concealer for months, but then I came across the Hourglass Airbrush Concealer and my life changed. I've tried to use this in the past, but the Sephora works by my local store always pushes me in different directions so I was convinced it can't be that great. The Sephora sale happened, and I caved and bought it. I color matched on my own and I was SHOOK with the outcome. The formulation makes your skin look smooth like butter. I just swipe a small line on both cheeks and blend with the Saie big brush (highly recommend) and it blends like a dream. A little goes a long way! It's so lightweight, that I can't even tell it's on. Where has this been on my acne journey. I highly recommend this concealer with my whole heart. My hormonal acne friends give it a try, you won't regret it. The ONLY flaw is the tubing leaks easily with too much product coming out at once.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer standouts for its full coverage and flawless finish. The texture is creamy yet lightweight, making it easy to blend without feeling heavy on the skin. It works great for covering dark circles, blemishes, and any discoloration while giving a smooth, airbrushed look that doesnu2019t cake up or settle into fine lines. One of the things I really appreciate is its long-lasting wearu2014it holds up well throughout the day, even on my dry skin. The concealer dries down to a natural matte finish, which keeps my under-eye area looking bright without being too dewy or shiny. It does dry quickly, so blending it in sections works best for me. The shade range is also impressive, allowing for a good match across different skin tones. Overall, if you want a concealer that gives a natural but flawless finish, stays put, and doesnu2019t feel heavy, the Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer is a great pick.

It's very creamy and blends well but you have to definitely work fast to blend before it dries down because it does bunch up in dry spots if you let it sit for too long. reviews.review_title: Hourglass will make your dark circles vanish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer is a creamy, full coverage product. A little bit of product goes a long way. It does dry down fairly quickly so have your brush, finger or blender ready to go to work. I applied this as I would for everyday use. That means no primer and no setting spray. After several hours the concealer was still brightening the dark circles underneath my eyes. I experienced very minimal creasing. Hourglass offers a wide variety of shades which means they can be used as concealer, highlighter, contour, color corrector and more. The color that I used is- Creme.I was pretty happy with the color match. This liquid formula is waterproof, cruelty free, vegan and offers up to 16 hours of brightening wear. The microspherical powders brighten and blur imperfections  and diminishes fine lines and wrinkles. Conceal the appearance of dark circles and blemishes to give your skin and natural airbrush look. There is very minimal fragrance and I did not find this to be irritating to my eyes at all. I used a slanted fluffy concealer brush to apply the Hourglass concealer. I smiled and then gently applied in the areas that needed the most brightening while also ensuring not to over apply the concealer into my fine lines. If the product performs this well without primer and setting spray do I really even need those products? Probably not. I can only imagine the extra steps may help it perform even better. Overall, I am very happy with this concealer and I recommend it.

reviews.review_title: A 'no' for my GenX combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of Hourglass Cosmetics so this is a product I was eager to try! I selected the shade Cru00e8me - 1.5 because it is recommended for fair skin with pink undertones, and that describes my skin exactly. In hindsight, I should have gone for their shade Birch - 1 for fair skin with neutral undertones because in online product shots it seems just a tad bit lighter. My skin is so porcelain it is almost translucent and Cru00e8me ended up being just a smidge too dark, even when well-blended. It also ended up being too yellow for my skintone as well. Unfortunately that did not balance out the dark circles under my eyes. It actually enhanced them.  I also felt the formula dried a little too dry for my combination skin. I feel like it enhanced the fine lines and small wrinkles rather than, well, conceal them. With this formula less is also definitely more. It's a creamy consistency but did not dry down that way on me and creased fairly quickly on my GenX skin. I think I may try it with a more dewy concealer I have that's much lighter and see how they blend. But on its own, this one is a pass for me. Your mileage may vary, however, as this is an extremely popular product and is well-reviewed. If you're a bit younger and have skin that trends more oily-combination than dry-combination, it should work very well for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always trying to find the best concealer to help camouflage my under eye hollows and dark circles. The Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer went on creamy, blended easily and provided great coverage. I used the given applicator to apply to my face and felt it dispensed a good amount of product without being too much. I then used my finger, a brush and a beauty sponge on different days, and each blended well without issue. This concealer provided pretty decent coverage on its own, but I did like this with an added color corrector. I set this with setting spray and powder, but also tried without setting, and thought it worked well both ways as it did not crease or settle into fine lines. After eight hours of wear, this still looks good on my skin. I have a slight tan at the moment, and would consider myself to be a light neutral and the shade I used was Silk, which matches my skin tone well. I think this is a nice option for concealers and would purchase in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer for a few days now, and it's quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. The coverage is incredible, effectively hiding dark circles, redness, and blemishes, especially under-eye circles and acne scars. Despite its full coverage, it blends seamlessly into the skin, giving a natural, skin-like finish without settling into fine lines or creasing. The formula is buildable, allowing for more coverage without looking cakey or heavy, making it versatile for different makeup looks. It stays put throughout the day without fading or shifting, which is perfect for long days or special occasions. The shade range is quite extensive, catering to a variety of skin tones and undertones. I chose the shade Dlax and itu2019s perfect for my olive skin. This is, however, it's on the pricier side compared to other concealers on the market, so whether it's worth the investment depends on your budget and how much you value high-quality makeup. The packaging, while sleek, can be a bit tricky to use, as the doe-foot applicator is great, but it can be difficult to get the right amount of product out of the tube. Overall, the Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer is a high-performance product that delivers on its promises. If you're looking for a concealer that offers excellent coverage, blends beautifully, and lasts all day, this might be the one for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve heard such great things about this Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer, so I was so excited to give it a try. I am 38 yrs old, combo skin, have large pores, and fine lines. My skin tone is Light with Neutral undertones, so I went with the shade Sepia 5. I was worried it be too dark, but it was a spot on match!  Let me tell you that this is my new favorite concealer! It feels so lightweight on the skin, you forget you have concealer on. It instantly concealed any blemish, pores, and fine lines. A little goes a long way, so you only need a few dots under your eyes to see how good this is. It also blends effortlessly, whether applied with fingers, a brush, or a sponge, and works beautifully under foundation or on its own for a more natural look. The doe-foot applicator makes it easy to target specific areas, and it dries down quickly without feeling cakey or heavy. While itu2019s on the pricier side, the results and longevity justify the cost, especially for those who value a professional finish. Overall, the Vanish Airbrush Concealer delivers on its promises, making it a top choice for anyone looking to achieve a flawless, long-lasting look.

reviews.review_text: The Hourglass Airbrush Concealer is a real gem for anyone looking to up their makeup game. One of the best things about it is how long it lasts. What really sets it apart, though, is the natural finish. It blends into the skin beautifully, giving you that soft, airbrushed look without any cakiness. The creamy texture makes it super easy to apply, whether you prefer using your fingers or a brush. Plus, you can build it up to get just the coverage you wantu2014no need to worry about it looking heavy.  Another highlight is how crease-resistant it is. A lot of concealers settle into fine lines, but not this one. It stays smooth all day, which is a huge plus if youu2019re concerned about aging or just want to look fresh.  Overall, the Hourglass Airbrush Concealer is a must-try if you want a reliable, natural-looking concealer that lasts. Itu2019s perfect for anyone who wants to look their best without a lot of fuss!

On the bright side, it's extremely easy to take off! But if you need it to withstand water at all (hello, rainy seattle) this stuff is a hard no.   I was so excited to have found a product that almost exactly matched my throat/chest, so I was using this concealer more as an all over the face product. But as a girl who wears make up to dance (it gets REAL sweaty) and is also getting over a broken heart, I very quickly learned this formula can't withstand any kind of water/moisture. reviews.review_text: After using a good number of different concealers, this has become my favorite! I bought the mini originally (I donu2019t really recommend that though cause itu2019s very small for the price) and the moment I finished I purchased the full size.It is actually full coverage- not one of those false marketing statements. Itu2019s very creamy, goes on smooth; I find application is smoothest with  your fingers. I would recommend using a moisturizer under it though, it can sometimes cling to dry patches, but it works great on both parts of my combination skin and stays on even with sweat or oil. If you can get over the price, itu2019s definitely a great choice!
